text.text_translated:
A lot of business today happens between different countries. Although most business people around the world use English to communicate, the way people communicate can be very different in each culture.

If you do not understand the normal business rules of another culture, it can cause problems. This can lead to misunderstandings and stop good communication. You might also form unfair opinions about the people you work with.

Here are three basic differences in polite business behavior around the world. This information will help you the next time you work with someone from a different culture.
